message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your offer of $120 is a good starting point, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $140. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand your offer of $110 is a good compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and compromise on the price. I'll offer you $130. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $130. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand your offer of $105 is getting closer to my minimum, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'll make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $125. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $125. I'm sticking to my previous counteroffer of $105. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
